info.title: Denver ARTCC OAuth2 Server
info.description: Documentation of the OAuth2 implementation at vZDV.  See RFC 6749 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749) and RFC 7636 (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7636) for more details.

get.description: Initializes an OAuth 2.0 flow using a response_type=token. See RFC 6749 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749) and RFC 7636 (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7636) for more details.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: This is the 'client_id' of the requesting client. Maximum 255 characters.

parameters.name: redirect_uri
parameters.description: The 'redirect_uri' that was registered for this client. It is required if multiple redirect_uri's have been registered for this client.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Not used. Will be shared back verbatim if provided.

parameters.name: code_challenge
parameters.description: The code_challenge value in the context of PKCE (RFC 7636).

parameters.name: code_challenge_method
parameters.description: The method that was used to create the code_challenge (S256).

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Value opaque to the server, used by the client to track its session. It will be returned as received.

400.description: Invalid parameters | Invalid redirect_uri | invalid client type | invalid response type | invalid code_challenge/method

401.description: The client could not be authenticated.

405.description: The HTTP method is not valid

post.description: Request access_token using OAuth 2.0 grant_type: authorization_code. See RFC 6749 for more details.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: The HTTP basic authorization header containing the client credentials as base64 encoded string (authorization: Basic base64(client_id:client_secret)). This can only be used INSTEAD of the parameters 'client_id', 'client_secret'.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: The client_id. This can only be used INSTEAD of using the authorization header. Maximum 255 characters.

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: The client_secret. This can only be used INSTEAD of using the authorization header.

parameters.name: grant_type
parameters.description: For grant_type=authorization_code: client_id, client_secret, code, and redirect_uri are required.

parameters.name: redirect_uri
parameters.description: Required if grant_type is authorization_code.  Must contain a valid auth code

parameters.name: code_verifier
parameters.description: A random value of 43-256 characters. See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7636#section-4 for details.  This parameter is required only when a code_challenge is provided with the authorization request for this session.

400.description: Bad Request, see x-ca-err for possible error codes

401.description: The client could not be authenticated.

200.description: Get JWK Keyset used by this OAuth2 Server

keys.description: JWK set in JSON array format

authToken200.description: A success response that includes the issued token, expire and other details from the OAuth Server

access_token.description: The Access Token for the given token request

code_challenge.description: The calculated code challenge from the verifier using method
